statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.85}+{5.63}\right)}={20.96}\approx{20.96}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{5.63}\cdot{4.64}={26.1232}\approx{26.1}.
